tool_description: Finds alternative shipping carriers and service options when primary shipping fails or needs to be replaced.

package_dimensions.description: Package dimensions as [length, width, height] in inches

error_messages: Invalid ZIP code: Provide valid 5-digit ZIP codes for origin and destination.
Invalid package specifications: Weight must be positive, dimensions must be positive numbers.
Unsupported delivery speed: Use one of (overnight, 2day, 3day, ground, economy).
No carriers available: No carriers meet the specified criteria and constraints.
Invalid cost limit: max_cost must be a positive number if specified.
usage: Provide shipping details including ZIP codes, package specs, and delivery speed. Optionally exclude specific carriers or set cost limits. The tool returns available carrier options with pricing and delivery estimates.

available_carriers.description: List of available carrier options with service details

cost_estimates.description: Shipping cost estimates for each carrier option

delivery_estimates.description: Delivery time estimates for each carrier option

recommended_option.description: Best recommended carrier option based on criteria
